page.title: 04CATTERLINE SCHOOL
page.content: At the start there were about sixty people all together but now there are 27 in 1985.There are 8 in primary 7, 1 in primary 6, 4 in primary 5, 3 in primary 4, 7 in primary 3, 1 in primary 2 and 3 in primary 1. We have two computers. They are ZX Spectrums with 48K memory and also a disc drive. We have an overhead projector. Catterline has its own kitchen. There are two cooks, an English teacher, a gym teacher, music teacher and an art teacher. All these teachers are part-time. There are two full-time teachers. The area covered by the school is about one acre. The subjects we learn are expressive arts, language arts, environmental studies, mathematics and religious education.
